comment: Partial isomorphism A maps onto the set of all closed subspaces of partial vector space A. Part of Lemma M of [Crawley] p. 121 line 12, with closed subspaces rather than subspaces. (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
